participant_1.background:
I like music that is upbeat and energetic, so I can keep my spirits up while I'm on bed rest.
i m originally from london , england.
if i were to be reincarnated , i would want to come back as a hippopotamus.
I am a bartender who enjoys a good time with my friends.
I love to play pretend and live out my fantasies in the LARP world.

participant_2.background:
My favorite websites include scuba diving blogs and movie review sites.
I try to keep myself young by trying new things and surrounding myself with positive people.
I love to listen to the avert brother while working on cases for the federal court.
i had 128 tackles last year.
i volunteer in my son s boy scout troop.

content.text: Hi there! How's your day going?
Good, thank you! What do you enjoy doing for fun?
I enjoy working out, scuba diving, and watching movies.
That's great! I like to play pretend and live out my fantasies in the LARP world.
LARP stands for Live Action Role Playing. It's a game where you dress up as a character and act out a story.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never heard of it before.
It is a lot of fun! I highly recommend checking it out.
I will definitely look into it. Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! What else do you like to do for fun?
I also like to play music, read, and volunteer.
That's cool! I play music too. What kind of music do you play?
I play the guitar and sing. I mostly play rock and blues music.
That's awesome! I love rock and blues music. I play the guitar and piano.
That's great! We should jam sometime!
I would love that! Let's exchange numbers and we'll set something up.
